hero_subtitle: Transform from tutorial follower to confident engineer. Learn the CLI commands that power real-world systems through interactive flashcards and hands-on practice.
cli_foundation: In modern software development, the command line isn't optional — it's the foundation of everything you build.
devops_desc: Deploy containers, scale services, debug pods — all with kubectl, docker, and shell scripts.
platform_purpose: A platform that bridges the gap between tutorial knowledge and real-world engineering confidence.
mission_desc: was created to solve a critical problem in developer education: the gap between knowing syntax and having the confidence to work with real systems.
mission_paragraph: Too many developers learn frameworks and languages but freeze when faced with a terminal. We believe that CLI mastery is the key to confidence, employability, and autonomy in tech.
feature1_desc: Flip cards to learn commands with real-world explanations and use cases. Each card includes context, examples, and best practices.
footer_desc: Master CLI commands through interactive flashcards.
